derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin, neuter of reptilis, from Latin rept- 'crawled', from the verb repere

entry.def: Reptiles are a group of cold-blooded animals which have skins covered with small hard plates called scales and lay eggs. Snakes, lizards, and crocodiles are reptiles.

means.word_mean: 1. any cold-blooded vertebrate of the class Reptilia including tortoises turtles snakes lizards alligators crocodiles and extinct forms
